jobDescription: Develop and implement automation solutions using RPA tools (Automation Anywhere, UiPath), AI/ML technologies, and programming languages like Python, VBA Macros, and .NET.  Collaborate with cross-functional teams, conduct thorough testing, provide user support, and maintain documentation.
benefitsOffered: Opportunities for professional growth and development
Exposure to a variety of automation technologies and projects
Supportive team culture with mentorship from experienced professionals
